A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly I don't think the critics watched the same movie as me.  This movie was so cornball its laughable.  It has some of the worst moments in Star Wars history.  It also has an endless parade of pointless cute aliens that look like they were extras in 'The Dark Crystal' or 'Never Ending Story'.  I guess they were added to sell toys.  Its not all bad.  It has some cool moments\, but best ever Star Wars deserving 5 stars? Hell no...
